attributes.action: Put a cap on the numbers of E U migrant workers
attributes.additional_details: I firmly believe that the U K government should exercise the right to put a cap on the numbers of E U migrant workers. We are inundated with unnecessary job seekers in this country, also accomodation, public services etc, are stretched to breaking point. If our government, (who seem to be hell bent on change), are really concerned about unemployment and reducing the dependancy on state benefits, then I think they should act. We don't need more houses, just less people!
